trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that raised a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Especifica la acción que ha provocado un evento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by members such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Esta enumeración se usa en los miembros como el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction> enumeración.

trans-unit.source: To run the example paste the following code in a form containing a TreeView control named TreeView1.
trans-unit.target: Para ejecutar el ejemplo, pegue el código siguiente en un formulario que contenga un control TreeView denominado TreeView1.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes TreeView1 is populated with items and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is connected to the event-handling method defined in the sample.
trans-unit.target: En este ejemplo se da por supuesto que TreeView1 se rellena con elementos y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterSelect?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento está conectado al método de control de eventos definido en el ejemplo.

trans-unit.source: The event was caused by a keystroke.
trans-unit.target: Una pulsación de tecla ha ocasionado el evento.

trans-unit.source: The event was caused by a mouse operation.
trans-unit.target: Una operación del mouse ha ocasionado el evento.

trans-unit.source: The event was caused by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> collapsing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> que se contrae ha ocasionado el evento.

trans-unit.source: The event was caused by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> expanding.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> que se expande ha ocasionado el evento.

trans-unit.source: The action that caused the event is unknown.
trans-unit.target: Se desconoce la acción que ha causado el evento.
